scripts.build:reset: npm prune && rimraf server && rimraf ui && mkdirp server && mkdirp ui
scripts.build:angular: cd node_modules/angular_personal && npm install && npm run build && cpy --parents dist/**/* ../../ui
scripts.build:reactjs: cd node_modules/reactjs_personal && npm install && npm run build && cpy --parents dist/**/* ../../ui && cpy --parents node_modules/react/umd/react.development.js ../../ui && cpy --parents node_modules/react-dom/umd/react-dom.development.js ../../ui && cpy index.html ../../ui
scripts.build:nodejs: cd node_modules/nodemongo_personal && npm install && npm run grunt && cpy --parents dist/**/* ../../server && cpy --parents bin/**/* ../../server
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:ui && npm run build:server
